TopicTitle: Some little know (at least I think they are) controls

Articles.Content:
Here are some little known controls

If you hold Shift and press WASD on a ladder, your kerbal will look in that direction.

Good for Cinematics.

Next is if you hold shift and right click in the SPH, you can pan the camera.

Here is the camera in the far corner. Good for large planes.

Finally, if you hold shift and scroll in the VAB, you can quickly zoom in and out.

Very zoomed out. Good for large rockets.

Share yours!

in IVA if you double-click on a window it will center it, while still allowing you to zoom in and out
While in map view, you can press backspace to focus on your craft again.
